Header: SF-J Commander Speaks to Woman Soldiers
Content: Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna paid a formal visit to the 7 Sri Lanka Army Women's Corps (7 SLAWC) camp in Jaffna on Thursday (5). On arrival, he was warmly welcomed by the Commanding Officer 7 SLAWC. The Commanding Officer afterwards presented a comprehensive briefing on role and tasks of their unit and other administrative matters. Subsequently, the Security Forces Commander addressed the Officers and Other Ranks of the 7 SLAWC.
